note: INSTITUTE OF BANKING STUDIES (IBS) had a humble start as a IBPS bank coaching institute to groom and coach the bank job aspirants to take up a career in banking sector. The instant success in guiding the students to secure placement in banks increased our enthusiasm to extend our expertise by introducing IIBF flagship certification courses, such as DB&F, JAIIB, CAIIB, CCP, Forex, and other certification courses for bankers. Since then IBS has added value to the profiles of more than 14,000 bank
